author: jimmygchen
content:
Hi,
<@665236020312145930>  and I have both spent some time on eip-4844 and we are interested in contributing to implementation in Lighthouse. We hope to connect with mentor <@602753420033785856>  and <@361447803194441738>  to figure out how we could help and collaborate with the main implementers at Lighthouse. Would it be useful to have a discord channel for this?

We think the Prysm design document the other group has done here was a great idea: https://hackmd.io/@pavignol/SJh-plvNo and we'd like to create one similar to this for the Lighthouse 4844 implementation.

Thanks and keen to hear your thoughts üôè

author: paulhauner
content:
I‚Äôve made an eip4844-developers channel in the Lighthouse Discord: https://discord.gg/ThGGbFn7

Please feel free to hop in there and introduce yourselves! Michael is on leave at the moment so I‚Äôm happy to kick off the mentoring. Once you‚Äôre in the above channel I‚Äôll reach out via DM and we can figure out how to best do this.

FYI I‚Äôm on Sydney time but I regularly work with other timezones.
